title: Integrated Use of Computer-Based and Face-to-Face Learning: Blended Learning Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Focuses on professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields applying scientific knowledge to practice, operating in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% engagement by integrating computer-based learning tools (apps/mobile platforms) with face-to-face discussion sessions in a blended learning environment
Learners write analytical reports comparing the self-directed nature of computer-based learning with the collaborative characteristics of face-to-face learning through science-career-linked projects
Learners achieve over 75% proficiency in three or more formative assessments through smartphone-based assignment submissions and face-to-face feedback sessions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
